Healthy.description: The plant is healthy and shows no signs of disease.
Healthy.symptoms: No symptoms, the plant is in good condition.
Healthy.causes: No known causes as the plant is healthy.

Mosaic.description: The plant exhibits a mosaic pattern on the leaves, often indicating viral infection.
Mosaic.symptoms: Mosaic pattern on leaves, which appears as patches of light and dark green.
Mosaic.causes: Viral infection, often spread by insects or contaminated tools.

RedRot.description: RedRot causes the plant tissues to rot, leading to reduced yield and quality.
RedRot.symptoms: Rotting or browning of plant tissues, especially at the base of the stem.
RedRot.causes: Bacterial or fungal infection, poor drainage, or overwatering.

Rust.description: Rust diseases are characterized by reddish-brown pustules on leaves, caused by fungal infections.
Rust.symptoms: Small, reddish-brown pustules on the leaves, often accompanied by yellowing.
Rust.causes: Fungal infection, often spread by wind or rain.

Yellow.description: Yellowing of leaves can indicate nutrient deficiencies or stress conditions.
Yellow.symptoms: Leaves turn yellow, often starting from the tips and moving inwards.
Yellow.causes: Nutrient deficiencies, especially nitrogen, or environmental stress.
